Articles.Content:
Of course i do! I love my country!

The user below me believes in chicken soup

False. Though I like chicken soups.

User below me dreams of ponies every night.

No. I dream of tea.

The user below me has read 1984.

And enjoyed it thoroughly!

The user below me enjoys reading the works of Shakespeare.

You mean the old idiot whose boring writing I was forced to read? Screw him and his ye olde english writing.

The user below me likes George Orwell.

P.S. 1984 Is my favorite fictional book.

Eh, Animal Farm, 1984, The Preacher's Daughter... Yeah, I'd say so...

The user below me does not read for pleasure.

I only read when it's needed, or if I need to study. And when I got nothing to do.

User below me has been to another country at some time in his/her life.

Kinda. Not really, though.

The user below me has never left their home country.

I have been to canada. Does that count in you're mind?

The user below me lives on.. I don't know... Mars.

True. Too bad return trip will be a decades more, due to planetary alignment. They're now worried at me back there...

User below me is a Titanium-based life form.

Nope, carbon based.

The user below me laughs at the tiny people who think there big.

Yup.

The user below me thinks that Antikythera is an awesome word.

*cricket --- wait for 10 minutes before posting*

The next user would be silent much longer than that. If you posted in 10 minutes, you are (CENSORED) (CENSORED).

true

the user below me is an Ununoctium based lifeform

false carbon based

The user below me thinks the surface of Venus is pretty much Hell.

true, almost worse than hell

the user below me abuses their power

We users have as much power as we have, not enough to abuse power...

The next user said a statement that is true.

you lied

the user below me is not a dalek

True. (And you said I'm lying...)

The next user said a statement.

Yes, many times I have made statements.

The user below me has heard of the Alexandrov Ensemble, without wikiing it.

Unknown to me.

The next user have a signature.

True, I think

The next user is a mod maker

false

the user below me has been to Antarctica

No.

The user below me is more stupid than I am.

well no if I learned about cells organelles ,and virus when i was 2 grade.(books)

The user below me has an muffin.
